# Simple Disciple (Trait)
## Overview
**Simple Disciple**: You picked up skill in a craft or a profession during your time at a monastery. You gain a +1 trait bonus on checks with a [[Profession (Skill)|Profession]] or [[Craft (Skill)|Craft]] skill of your choice. 

**Source:** Ultimate Campaign, pg. 61
